reviews.text: This is one of my favorite castles in Europe, the best part is undoubtedly the view of Bled Island, the castle tour is also very good. The walk up to the castle is fairly steep but not that long compared to other castles. I have seen people go up by horse and cart. It's also worth knowing that there is a car park close to the castle grounds.

It's a wonderful castle which offers a magnificent view of Bled lake and surrounding areas. It's accessible by road as well as by foot. There's small trek from lake which would take you around 15-20 minutes to reach up to the castle. Castle has a museum, restaurant and a gift shop.
Entry here isn't free but there's student discount.

Breathtaking view of Bled Lake, Bled Castle and Cathedral from wide variety angle...you may take one whole day to take pictures of them. The gelato ice cream in the cathedral area is simple the best ice cream we've ever had with wide variety of tastes...don't miss it only for 2 euro 1 scoop and 3 euro mixed scoop.

A historic castle perched on the edge of a mountain overlooking a lake. If you’re looking for in-depth tours of all the rooms and ramparts, this is not the place for you. However, if you want spectacular views of the Julian Alps and Lake Bled, then it’s completely worth the price of admission.  (11€ per person by the way) It was raining so we drove but it’s also accessible by foot if you want to make the hike. Parking is 3€. 

We also took advantage of the restaurant which was delicious. So if you want a meal, I recommend it.

The views are fantastic and the restaurant located in there has amazing food. Bets for hiking and enjoying a good sunny day out!

Worth a visit!
Amazing you can even clim up on top and ha e amazing view on the valley
The view is absolutely stunning, I would definitely recommend to anyone thinking about coming here!
Nice place to visit. Great view and great sports climbing area.
Falls are tiny and underwhelming. My shower at home has more water. not worth any walk there unless it's really really on the way. Otherwise not worth a detour even if 200 meters.
A bit underwhelming. The falls are set back in a crack in the rock above a man-made pool. A nice couple of ladders to climb to the right which gets you above the falls and overlooking the balley

I can't say enough good things about Bled Castle Restaurant. My husband and I had reservations near the window and it had a stunning view! I was mesmerized looking out at the lake and mountains. The service was good and the food was amazing! My first time trying Bled Cream Cake, and it did not disappoint! l definitely hope to return to Slovenia in the future and visit this restaurant again.

If you come at the Bled Castle, make sure you visit this restaurant. If you're lucky enough, or make a reservation at the time, you'll get seated at the window, to witness the majestic view on the lake and mountains. Try to do it at the sunset and you'll be surprised with colours...

The food is simply great. Fresh, tasty local ingredients mixed with creative spirit of a chef and the local cuisine. The soup with the trout caviar is among the best I've tried and main courses are amazing, just as desserts!
Great ambient, romantic place with great view. Excelent service and perfect food. I recommend it.

I was visiting Bled in the afternoon when I decided first go to the castle as a friend  told me the views are amazing and the sunset is very unique.
I felt hungry so I booked the restaurant.

It was a unique experience the food was amazing , well presented, with unique flavours.

The service was impeccable the views breath taken 
Prices were ok

Exquisite service n food. Dinner only serves the tasting menu, which is a 3 course meal + sparkling wine. Every dish was amazing. Best meal in Bled. Great views of the lake if you choose to sit outside. Free entrance to the castle when you have a reservation.

We recently had our wedding reception at Restaurant Labod. The food was outstanding and the service was second to none. Mico the manager did everything in his power to make our day amazing, and it was. I would recommend to anyone who wants a wedding with great views, food and service to book the Labod. Wonderful, truly wonderful ❤️. Thank you Mico and wonderful cooks and staff
Fantastic views, menu, wine, food and service.  We loved our dinner there. Nice to see staff that know "the rules". Thank you!
It makes you choke LABOD. Another great example of post communist tourist mecca.
Loved it. Great food !

Decent price for a five star meal.  The view of the castle and lake, the service, the food, and the location are all amazing.  We had filling meals and amazing desserts. 

Keep walking up the stairs, it's a little behind another restaurant.  You will not be disappointed. 

Also, if available, get the Karst Style Steak, it is amazing!

It is one of those places you just have to visit if you are visiting Bled lake. One of the best seafood restaurants in Slovenia, with great wine selection. Friendly staff, good service and  nice ambient.
Excellent food and service. Sit outside and enjoy the views. Service was wonderful and hospitable. Good for kids too.

The restaurant it’s a lovely spot in Bled. It’s a must if you’re on the area. Unfortunately I don’t have pictures of the dishes, but everything we had was wonderful. I suggest to order the stuffed seafood. 

Keep in mind that the restaurant is small and you might need to book a table to eat here.
Amazing food! We had the fish and it was so good. Lots of garlic which we loved

Great atmosphere, cozy. Great service (the waiter worked like it was his restaurant) good food  a lot of variety  on the menu and  at a very reasonable price .highly recommended. Suggest reservation as very popular .
The owner is a very nice and friendly lady, the food was fresh and delicious. The restaurant is very nice and clean. Dogs are allowed. And there is a parking place only for the guests.

We had a very great lunch here. The meals were incredibly delicious (pumpkin soup, meat mix, chicken+mozzarella), I can recommend all off them.
The owner lady was very kind, friendly.
This restaurant made the sLOVEnia feeling for me
Stay away from this restaurant, the only good thing here is the walnut bread you get before the terrible meal. Service is quick and the people serving are also nice

I just entered the restaurant and the waitress was VERY rude with me. So I had no other option but leave immediately.

You can see the management isn't worried about the  customers when the bad reviews are replied with offenses.

Having been on the way all day long crossing Austria and entering Slovenia, it was a great delight to have a great meal at the end of the day. Topolino has a really nice garden that I chose being there in the middle of summer. Tastes very excellent, service too. Surely a place to recommend.
